00032 struct InputEvent
00033 {
00034         // Supported event types.
00035         enum Type 
00036         { 
00038                 Move, 
00041                 Down, 
00044                 Up, 
00047                 Trace, 
00050                 Untrace,
00051 
00054                 Click,
00057                 DoubleClick,
00060                 MoveLeft,
00063                 MoveRight,
00066                 MoveUp,
00069                 MoveDown,
00072                 SplitStart,
00075                 SplitEnd,
00078                 Split,
00081                 RotateStart,
00084                 RotateEnd,
00087                 Rotate,
00088         };
00089 
00090         // id of the source of this event. Input services associate unique ids to each of their event sources.
00091     unsigned int sourceId;
00092         
00093         // Type of the service that generated this event.
00094         enum InputService::ServiceType serviceType;
00095 
00096         // Unique id of the service that generated this event.
00097         int serviceId;
00098 
00099         // The event type.
00100     enum Type type;
00101 
00102         // Event flags.
00103         unsigned int flags;
00104 
00105         // Event timestamp.
00106         unsigned int timestamp;
00107 
00108         // Position 
00109         Vector3f position;
00110 
00111         // Rotation.
00112         Vector4f rotation;
00113 
00114         // Vector storing additional event parameters (i.e. split distance / ratio for Split events)
00115         Vector3f value;
00116 
00117         // Point set
00118         int numberOfPoints;
00119         Vector3f pointSet[32];
00120 };
00121 
00122 }; // namespace omega
